scripts.review: tsc -b &&  vite build && kill-port 4173 && npx vite preview
scripts.dev: npm run kill && npm run check-css-vars && vite --host --port 3000
scripts.build: npm run check-css-vars && tsc -b ||  vite build
scripts.simulate-worflow-generate-docs: npx resume export --theme dev-ats-es --format html src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html && wkhtmltopdf src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.pdf && pandoc src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.html -o src/generate-resume-files-by-workflow/cv.docx
scripts.version-upgrade: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m "chore: bump version to $(node -p -e "require('./package.json').version")" && git push -f
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm cache clean --force && npm install
